translation: You should indeed tell, without reserve, of your divine glories by which you exist, pervading all these worlds. (No one else can do so.)
commentary: 10.16 to tell? Arhasi (Thou) shouldst? Asheshena without reminder? Divine: divine? Hi indeed? Atmavibhutiyah Thy glories? by which by which? with glories by glories? Lokan worlds? Iman these? You Thou? pervasive having pervaded? you remain existest.No Commentary.
